EmailTemplate.description: SPC Private Brand Toner Site Level
EmailTemplate.name: SPC Private Brand Toner Site Level
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot / OfficeMax Acct# {!Account.AOPS_Seq_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on my call. Please let me know when you are available to talk about important updates to your Office Depot Business account, {!Account.AOPS_Seq_ID__c}. Looking forward to speaking with you soon!
Our Procurement Registration and/or in-store, Store Purchasing Card program allow you to receive the in-store price or your business-discounted pricing (whichever is lower), including copy & print discounts, when you shop at any of our retail locations.
Office Depot print cartridges manufactured by Clover Imaging Group, (CIG) are as reliable as the OEM!
Office Depot Brand print cartridges are laboratory tested for quality, performance and page yield, covered by a full product warranty! Plus, they cost less than other national brands!
Video Link: http://www.cloverimaging.com/BLI-Testing.
IPW Remanufacatured Laser Toner Cartridges have a proven track record of reducing printing costs specializing in complex remanufactured color, high yield, and MICR toner cartridges – as well as universal laser toner cartridges that function in multiple brands and models of printers.
Recycling Program - Phone: 1-855-821-2335 https://www.mybusinessrecycles.com/index.aspx
Save Time with Subscriptions
https://business.officedepot.com/cm/marketing/subscriptions/?hijack=subcription&type=Search
It’s convenient -- subscribing makes the ordering process easier, and frees up your valuable time. You only have to set it up once, create a delivery schedule that suits your requirements -- no need to log back in again! You will never run out of those items that you use consistently. A reminder email will be sent seven days before each delivery.
If needed, you can change or cancel your subscription at any time. My personal goal as your account manager is to become a trusted resource and consultant to you and your organization. I am here to assist you with anything you may need including furniture, tech, marketing materials, print solutions, cleaning and break room!
Office Depot National Business Resources:
Avendra Customer Service: 1-866-308-0806 Customer Service Help Line - 1-888-777-4044 - Customer Service Representatives are product specialists best suited to Place Orders, handle item requests quickly, address Shipping Issues, Returns and Order Tracking requests.
Invoice Requests: inv-pods@officedepot.com Billing Department - 800-721-6592, Opt 3 Email: abbillingsupport@officedepot.com Electronic Commerce Support/Web Help - 1-800-269-6888
We appreciate your business!
Sincerely,
Inside Sales Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. Tel: 1-855-337-6811 Ext | @officedepot.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
